item.title: UniCredit's Orcel could still sweeten his bid and take on a double M&A offensive
item.description: Divided between two takeover courtships, UniCredit's Andrea Orcel may need to decide between going big abroad or staying home.

item.title: Asia markets mixed as investors assess Japan spending data and India rate decision
item.description: Japan's household spending in October fell 1.3% year-over-year, slower than the 2.6% decline estimated by analysts.

item.title: India's central bank revises down economic growth forecast for 2025, keeps interest rate steady
item.description: The Reserve Bank of India has held interest rate steady since February last year, while a sharper-than-anticipated slowdown in India's growth has made...

item.title: Stock futures are little changed ahead of key jobs report: Live updates
item.description: Investors expect Friday's jobs report to give further insight into the U.S. labor market and think it could impact the Fed's upcoming rate decision.
